MessageTypes.label: Set Left Fuel Gallons
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Left Fuel Quantity

MessageTypes.label: Set Right Fuel Gallons
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Right Fuel Quantity

MessageTypes.label: ETG Temperature
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Exhaust Gas Temperature

MessageTypes.label: EGT Marker
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the EGT Marker

MessageTypes.label: Fuel Flow (GPH)
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Fuel Flow in Gallons per Hour

MessageTypes.label: Oil Temperature
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the Oil Temperature

MessageTypes.label: Oil Pressure
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as the Oil Pressure

MessageTypes.label: Vacuum Pressure
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Vacuum Pressure in inches of Mercury (IN Hg)

MessageTypes.label: AMPs
MessageTypes.description: $ will be displayed as Ammeter reading in Amps
